IP.Name: GTZC
IP.About: GTZC : Global Trust Zone Software Controler

RefParameter.Name: TZSC_Lock_GTZC1
RefParameter.Comment: Lock the configuration of Core domain (GTZC1) of TZSC (Peripherals & MPCWM) until next reset

RefParameter.Name: TZSC_Secure_IP_Choice
RefParameter.DefaultValue: by Individual Securing from full Not Secured

PossibleValue.Value: by Individual Securing from full Not Secured
PossibleValue.Comment: by Individual Securing from full Not Secured

PossibleValue.Value: by Individual Unsecuring from full Secured
PossibleValue.Comment: by Individual Unsecuring from full Secured

RefParameter.Description: Secure/Unsecure all the Peripherals in one time until individuals are modified.

PossibleValue.Comment: there is some IP not secured

RefParameter.Name: TZSC_Privilege_IP_Choice
RefParameter.DefaultValue: by Individual Privileging from full Not Privileged

PossibleValue.Value: by Individual Privileging from full Not Privileged
PossibleValue.Comment: by Individual Privileging from full Not Privileged

PossibleValue.Value: by Individual Unprivileging from full Privileged
PossibleValue.Comment: by Individual Unprivileging from full Privileged

RefParameter.Description: Privilege/Unprivilege all the Peripherals in one time until individuals are modified.

Condition.Diagnostic: Active on GTZC context (aligned to Secure status for Multi Project) and pre-selected all Peripheral Privileged

Active on GTZC context (aligned to Secure status for Multi Project)

PossibleValue.Comment: MPCWM settings are locked until next reset

RefParameter.Name: MPCWM1_Area_Choice
RefParameter.Description: Secure/Unsecure all the memory range in one time until sizes are modified.

RefParameter.Name: MPCWM1_Area1_Size
RefParameter.Description: 0x0 : use the default HW configuration (secured and privileged memory)

RefParameter.Name: MPCWM1_Area1_Size
RefParameter.Description: 0x0 : use the default HW configuration (secured and privileged memory)

RefParameter.Name: MPCWM1_Area1_Lock
RefParameter.Comment: Lock the configuration of MPCWM1 Area 1 until next reset

RefParameter.Name: MPCWM1_Area2_Size
RefParameter.Description: 0x0 : use the default HW configuration (secured and privileged memory)

RefParameter.Name: MPCWM1_Area2_Lock
RefParameter.Comment: Lock the configuration of MPCWM1 Area 2 until next reset

RefParameter.Name: MPCWM2_Area_Choice
RefParameter.Description: Secure/Unsecure all the memory range in one time until sizes are modified.

RefParameter.Name: MPCWM2_Area1_Size
RefParameter.Description: 0x0 : use the default HW configuration (secured and privileged memory)

RefParameter.Name: MPCWM2_Area1_Size
RefParameter.Description: 0x0 : use the default HW configuration (secured and privileged memory)

RefParameter.Name: MPCWM2_Area1_Lock
RefParameter.Comment: Lock the configuration of MPCWM2 Area 1 until next reset

RefParameter.Name: MPCWM2_Area2_Size
RefParameter.Description: 0x0 : use the default HW configuration (secured and privileged memory)

RefParameter.Name: MPCWM2_Area2_Lock
RefParameter.Comment: Lock the configuration of MPCWM2 Area 2 until next reset

RefParameter.Name: MPCWM3_Area_Choice
RefParameter.Description: Secure/Unsecure all the memory range in one time until sizes are modified.

RefParameter.Name: MPCWM3_Area_Size
RefParameter.Description: 0x0 : use the default HW configuration (secured and privileged memory)

RefParameter.Name: MPCWM3_Area_Size
RefParameter.Description: 0x0 : use the default HW configuration (secured and privileged memory)

RefParameter.Name: MPCWM3_Area_Lock
RefParameter.Comment: Lock the configuration of MPCWM3 Area until next reset

RefParameter.Name: MPCWM4_Area_Choice
RefParameter.Description: Secure/Unsecure all the memory range in one time until sizes are modified.

RefParameter.Name: MPCWM4_Area_Size
RefParameter.Description: 0x0 : use the default HW configuration (secured and privileged memory)

RefParameter.Name: MPCWM4_Area_Size
RefParameter.Description: 0x0 : use the default HW configuration (secured and privileged memory)

RefParameter.Name: MPCWM4_Area_Lock
RefParameter.Comment: Lock the configuration of MPCWM4 Area until next reset

RefParameter.Name: MPCBB_SRWILADIS
RefParameter.Comment: Authorize Secure Read/Write on Non-secure area

PossibleValue.Comment: Secure Read/Write access not allowed on non-secure SRAM block
Secure Read/Write access allowed on non-secure SRAM block
Default state (source clock secured if a secure area exists in the MPCBB and vice-versa)
Invert the state, source clock remains secure even if no secure block is set in the MPCBB
MPCBB configuration settings are not locked
MPCBB configuration settings are locked until next reset

RefParameter.Name: MPCBB_Area_Choice
RefParameter.DefaultValue: Use default memory from Linker File template
RefParameter.Description: Secure/Unsecure all the memory range in one time until attributes are modified.

RefParameter.Name: MPCBB_Area_Privilege_Choice
RefParameter.Description: Privilege/UnPrivilege all the memory range in one time until attributes are modified.

RefParameter.Name: MPCBB_Area_Privilege_Choice
RefParameter.Description: Privilege/UnPrivilege all the memory range in one time until attributes are modified.

PossibleValue.Comment: MPCBB memory attribute settings are not locked
MPCBB memory attribute settings are locked until next reset
MPCBB memory attribute settings lock - customized configuration
